text: Mohamad Chatah (; 7 March 1951 â€“ 27 December 2013) was a Lebanese economist and diplomat. He served as Ambassador to the United States from 1997 to 2000. He was also Minister of Finance from 2008 to 2009. He was born in Tripoli. He was a Sunni Muslim. On 27 December 2013, Chatah was killed in a bombing in central Beirut. His killing was called a terrorist attack and an assassination. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Lebanon Category:Assassinated Lebanese people Category:Economists Category:Lebanese politicians Category:Lebanese Muslims Category:People murdered in Asia
title: Mohamad Chatah
